tool_description: News Search through millions of articles from over 80,000 large and small news sources and blogs.
name: Newslit News Search
title: Newslit News Search

api_list.name: /news

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset of first item in result (default 0)

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Number of items in response (default 10, max 100)
